trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Compton
There were no other sightings in Compton on or around July 12th 2012
divs: Sighting Details I have seen these "Orbs" more than once. One night I has an argument with my girlfriend. I went outside to take a walk around 10 pm. As I was walking I looked to my left (North) and saw a floating light. I had seen them before so I just stared at it and it disappeared in thin air like it usually does. It was moving westward at a slow pace. I was excited to see it because I have seen them many times.
Summary: I saw a ball of light floating in the sky over a school
